availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Native of Clay County, Kentucky. Worked as a farmer in Clay County in 1860. Married Jane Gibson on August 23, 1861. Served as a captain in company 1 of the 8th Kentucky Infantry in the Union Army.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Kentucky, Clay County, page 98.
Kentucky Marriage Records, 1852-1914, Clay County, 1861, page 10.
Kentucky Death Records, 1852-1964, Death Certificates, 1924-1929, Film 7017529, page 3247.
The Courier Journal, "Capt. William McDanel," May 28, 1928, page 16.
U.S. Civil War Pensions Index, Kentucky, Eighth Infantry, 159.
